part:
DYN_1_$ = ##modes##
DYN_2_$ = ##length##
DYN_3_$ = ##tension##
DYN_4_$ = ##density##
DYN_5_$ = ##radius##
young_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 1)
DYN_7_$ = ##freqLoss##
DYN_8_$ = ##constLoss##
MONO_STRING_$ = make_object('MONO-STRING', DYN_1_$, DYN_2_$, DYN_3_$, DYN_4_$, DYN_5_$, young_$, DYN_7_$, DYN_8_$)
CONST_9_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0.01)
CONST_10_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0.01)
CONST_11_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 15000)
CONST_12_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 15000)
CONST_13_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 100)
CONST_14_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 100)
CONST_15_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0)
CONST_16_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0)
MY_PLECTRUM_$ = make_object('BI-TWO-MASS', CONST_9_$, CONST_10_$, CONST_11_$, CONST_12_$, CONST_13_$, CONST_14_$, CONST_15_$, CONST_16_$)
PluckAccessPointController_$ = ##pluckpoint##
MY_STRING_PLK_$ = make_access(MONO_STRING_$, PluckAccessPointController_$, 'TRANS0')
CONST_19_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [1])
MY_PLECTRUM_PLK_$ = make_access(MY_PLECTRUM_$, CONST_19_$, 'TRANS0')
CONST_20_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [50])
make_connection('PLUCK', MY_STRING_PLK_$, 0, MY_PLECTRUM_PLK_$, 0.1, CONST_20_$)
CONST_21_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [0])
MY_PLECTRUM_MOV_$ = make_access(MY_PLECTRUM_$, CONST_21_$, 'TRANS0')
PlectrumPosition_$ = ##position##
make_connection('POSITION', MY_PLECTRUM_MOV_$, PlectrumPosition_$)
LISTENINGPOINT_$ = ##listeningpoint##
MY_STRING_OUT_$ = make_access(MONO_STRING_$, LISTENINGPOINT_$, 'TRANS0')
OUTPUTGAIN_$ = ##outputgain##
PointOutput_$ = make_point_output(MY_STRING_OUT_$, 0, OUTPUTGAIN_$)
